title: Bike Check: The Cervelo Aspero 5 of Wout van Aert at the UCI Gravel World Championship
content:
Van Aert's Cervelo Aspero-5 ahead of the UCI Gravel Worlds includes a Sram 2x drivetrain and immense saddle to bar drop.

Read the full article at Bike Check: The Cervelo Aspero 5 of Wout van Aert at the UCI Gravel World Championship on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
